thread.title: Jennifer S Brown
thread.title_full: ToursByLocals reviewed by Jennifer S Brown

author: Jennifer S Brown
title: Jennifer S Brown
text: We had a wonderful morning with Meir leading us (a group of 4 adults and 4 kids) around the Old City. We were a mix--some of us had been to Jerusalem many times, a couple were there for the first time--and Meir did a great job keeping us all engaged and seeing new things. He was terrific with the kids, and I left with a greater understanding of Jerusalem than when I started. I would absolutely book him again to see more of the city.
